pages.title: Fairy Grove Stone
pages.text: A grove stone should be prepared in the normal fashion, and then imbued with elements familiar to the fairies of the Fey World.$(br2)In addition to a $(l:groves/fairy/supplication.json)special spell of Fairy Supplication$(), the stone must be empowered with sufficient fairy energy, $(l:groves/fairy/fairy_grove)as outlined in another entry$().
